url.prompt: Get all the S24 ycombinator companies
url.result:
Here are the S24 Y Combinator companies:

1. **Xylem AI** - Multi-cloud stack for fine-tuning and inferencing open-source LLMs.
2. **Oway** - Ridesharing unused truck space to make SMB freight 50% cheaper.
3. **Kontigo** - USDC-based neobank for Latam SMBs.
4. **ZeroPath** - AI agents for end-to-end penetration testing.
5. **NextUI** - Open-source design system creation & management platform.
6. **Odo** - Win more government contracts at a fraction of the cost.
7. **Cartage** - Autonomous freight operations.
8. **SchemeFlow** - Automate the technical reports required for construction projects.
9. **Distro** - The AI co-pilot for sales reps at industrial wholesale distributors.
10. **Conductor Quantum** - Quantum computers on silicon chips using AI.
11. **Unriddle** - Read and write research papers faster.
12. **FINNY AI** - Using ML to supercharge organic growth for Financial Advisors.
13. **ReactWise** - Automated chemical process optimization.
14. **Panora** - Add integrations to your product in hours, not months. Open-Source.
15. **Manaflow** - Help non-technical teams automate technical business workflows.
16. **Arctic Capture** - Genetically engineering cyanobacteria for carbon capture.
17. **Fazeshift** - Automating Accounts Receivable.
18. **AminoAnalytica** - AI for protein-based drug manufacturability.
19. **Gauge** - Solving the monolith/microservices dilemma.
20. **Tandem** - Marketplace to help companies lease and share office space.
21. **AnswerGrid** - Accelerate your web research.
22. **Elevate** - Financial infrastructure for AI agents.
23. **Unbound Security** - Secure Gen AI apps for the modern enterprise.
24. **Wordware** - IDE for Building AI Agents with Natural Language Programming.
25. **Maitai** - Production-ready AI without the heavy lift.
26. **Phonely** - Go from a website to an AI receptionist in just a few minutes.
27. **Stack** - Open-source auth & user management for developers.
28. **Entangl** - Automating Engineering Design.
29. **ClaimSorted** - Third Party Administrator handling insurance claims with AI.
30. **Hamming AI** - Making AI reliable.
31. **Spaceium Inc** - Service hubs in space for spacecraft refuelling and repairs.
32. **Saphira AI** - Intelligent engineering design management for safety-critical products.
33. **Glasskube** - The next generation Package Manager for Kubernetes.
34. **Mem0** - Personalizing LLM responses.
35. **Ply Health** - Faster way to get providers in-network with payers.
36. **Apten** - Customizable AI SMS agents for businesses.
37. **Central** - Automated back-office platform - payroll, taxes, compliance, and more.

These companies span various industries including B2B, Fintech, Healthcare, Infrastructure, and more.

https://ycombinator.com/companies.result:
Here are 10 Y Combinator companies:

1. **Airbnb** - Book accommodations around the world.
2. **Amplitude** - Digital Analytics Platform.
3. **Coinbase** - Buy, sell, and manage cryptocurrencies.
4. **DoorDash** - Restaurant delivery.
5. **Dropbox** - Backup and share files in the cloud.
6. **Ginkgo Bioworks** - Our mission is to make biology easier to engineer.
7. **GitLab** - A complete DevOps platform delivered as a single application.
8. **Instacart** - Marketplace for grocery delivery and pickup.
9. **Matterport** - Turn physical objects and environments into 3D models in seconds.
10. **Oklo** - Emission free, always on power from advanced fission power plants.

Would you like more information on any of these companies?

https://www.hitec.org/attend/schedule.prompt: I want to get the schedule titles, dates and description for the first 5 scheduled events. You might need to click on each item on the schedule to get the description.
https://www.hitec.org/attend/schedule.result:
I have successfully retrieved the schedule titles, dates, and descriptions for the first 5 scheduled events. Here are the details:

1. **Title:** Registration Open
   - **Date:** Sunday, June 23
   - **Time:** 3:00 PM – 5:30 PM
   - **Description:** Registration Open

2. **Title:** Registration Open
   - **Date:** Monday, June 24
   - **Time:** 7:00 AM – 7:00 PM
   - **Description:** Registration Open

3. **Title:** Beverage Break
   - **Date:** Monday, June 24
   - **Time:** 8:30 AM – 9:00 AM
   - **Description:** Beverage Break

4. **Title:** HFTP Information Desk Open
   - **Date:** Monday, June 24
   - **Time:** 8:30 AM – 4:00 PM
   - **Description:** HFTP Information Desk Open

5. **Title:** #BeBamboo (by “DOING” What “Most People Don’t”)
   - **Date:** Monday, June 24
   - **Time:** 9:00 AM – 10:15 AM
   - **Description:**
     - **Location:** W207CD
     - **Credit Type:** CPE
     - **Credit Amount:** 1.5
     - **Details:** Hotels, clubs and restaurants are all members of an industry whose primary focus is to give and serve others. Hospitality is not always easy, as it requires passion, purpose, and teamwork to exceed the expectations of our guests, customers, and stakeholders. Join this engaging and memorable session presented by Bart Berkey, former Ritz-Carlton global executive and current CEO/founder of Most People Don’t. Berkey will share his trademark approach to managing self-focus, leadership and service beyond reason through #BeBamboo storytelling. This session embodies and celebrates the theme “It is EASY to BE, but BETTER to BECOME.” Learn how to become a better individual, leader, colleague, and service excellence provider by #BeBamboo and doing. In this session, attendees will:
       - Learn ways to embrace the #BeBamboo approach for personal balance, growth and energy. Tools will be provided to help attendees go with the flow instead of resisting things that we cannot change, which naturally allows us to take intentional action.
       - Hear methods to ensure that you are "doing" enough for your colleagues so every interaction is an opportunity for greater employee engagement and retention.
       - Gain best practices on how to “observe, anticipate and over-deliver” and understand ways to differentiate your service by sharing “stories, not snories.”

If you need further details or additional events, please let me know!
